headline: Leidos names Jason Albanese chief growth officer, succeeding Gerry Fasano who is retiring
summary: RESTON, Va., Feb. 19, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Leidos is promoting Jason Albanese to corporate executive vice president and chief growth officer effective March 3, succeeding Gerry Fasano who will retire...
